sentences.english: Conclusion Tobramycin eye drops is safety for clinic application.
sentences.chinese: 目的考察妥布霉素滴眼液的安全性。

sentences.english: Gentamycin was brought from Sanming pharmaceutical factory of Fujian.
sentences.chinese: 庆大霉素购自福建三明制药厂。

sentences.english: Fungizone intravenous in powder form should be stored in the refrigerator, protected against exposure to light.
sentences.chinese: 两性霉素B粉剂应避光存于冰箱中。

sentences.english: Objective: To analyze the adverse reactions of Clindamycin.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析克林霉素的不良反应。

sentences.english: This result was also confirmed by neomycin gene-containing replicons with same mutations.
sentences.chinese: 这一结果在新霉素包含子转染中也得到了证实。

sentences.english: Erythromycin and tylosin were widely used in veterinary.
sentences.chinese: 兽医临床最常用的是红霉素和泰乐菌素。

sentences.english: Induced accumulation of the acidic pathogenesis-related proteins ( PRs ) in tobacco leaves by ningnanmycin was studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了宁南霉素对烟草酸性病程相关蛋白的诱导表达。

sentences.english: A method for analysis of Chloramphenicol residues in sheep casing has been developed.
sentences.chinese: 建立羊肠衣中氯霉素残留含量的分析方法。

sentences.english: Fosfomycin also belong to middle type.
sentences.chinese: 此外，磷霉素也具有中等释放率。

sentences.english: These observations suggest that bleomycin A_6 may be useful in human liver cancer chemotherapy.
sentences.chinese: 研究结果提示博来霉素A_6有可能用于肝癌化疗。

sentences.english: But Roxithromycin sustained release pellets with smaller size show a better bioavailability.
sentences.chinese: 但小粒径罗红霉素缓释微丸具有更高的生物利用度。

sentences.english: Oxacillin and cefazolin were added to control infection.
sentences.chinese: 术后还加用新型青霉素和头孢唑啉，控制感染。

sentences.english: Conclusion Free radicals is one important factor on pingmycin sclerotherapy of hemangioma.
sentences.chinese: 结论自由基是平阳霉素发挥硬化作用的一个重要机制。

sentences.english: So we think the dwarf mutant "DDF-1" was GA insensitive.
sentences.chinese: 所以我们认为它是赤霉素相关突变体。

sentences.english: Antibacterial soaps in every bathroom. We'll be adding vancomycin to the water supply soon.
sentences.chinese: 马上我们就要加万古霉素在自来水里面了。

sentences.english: A coolie grabbed a handful of penicillin from a shelf.
sentences.chinese: 有一个苦力从货架上抓了几盒青霉素。
